name: UKCoreVaccinationProcedure
title: UK Core Vaccination Procedure
description: A set of codes that define a vaccination procedure. Selected from the following hierarchies within the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - Active or passive immunisation; - Seasonal influenza vaccination given by midwife; - Vaccination given.
